flawed_nl_solution:
Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<2400=2400>>2400 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 2400 - 1200 = <<2400-1200=1210>>1210 words more than Micah in an hour.
#### 1210

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 1210. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
